package.name: Magefast_ImportBundleProductType
package.summary: Add support for product type - BUNDLE, in Magento module Mage_ImportExport
package.description:
The extension will add new product type for Bundle product. Will available add/update products data via standard Magento import, for Bundle products type.
By default Bundle product type not supported for import data via CSV Mage_ImportExport module.
After install extension will available add/update data for Bundled products via standart Magento Import module (in top menu System - Import/Export - Import).
